mapper.insert: insert into members(m_idx, m_id, m_pw, m_name, m_reg, m_addr) values(members_seq.nextval, #{m_id}, #{m_pw}, #{m_name}, sysdate, #{m_addr})

insert into shop_t(idx, category, p_num, p_name, p_company, p_price, p_saleprice, p_image_s, p_image_l, p_content, p_date) values(SHOP_SEQ.nextval, #{category}, #{p_num}, #{p_name}, #{p_company}, #{p_price}, #{p_saleprice}, #{p_image_s}, #{p_image_l}, #{p_content}, sysdate)
